channel.title: Interleaved RSS Feed
channel.description: This is an interleaved feed of the most recent entries from each RSS source, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Inflation's persistence is killing hope for a Fed rate cut in 2024
item.description: The Fed's mandate is to strike a balance between keeping rates high enough to control inflation yet not so high as to damage the job market.

item.title: ConocoPhillips to buy Marathon Oil in $17.1 billion all-stock deal that bolsters shale assets
ConocoPhillips to buy Marathon Oil in deal valued at $22.5 billion
Russia-linked cyber attacks on Europe have doubled since 2023, top EU cybersecurity official says
item.description: Juhan Lepassaar, head of the European Union Agency for Cybersecurity, said that attack methods — while mostly unsuccessful — were often tried out in Ukraine before being expanded to EU countries.

item.title: Saudi Aramco to reportedly sell $10 billion to $20 billion worth of shares in new offering
item.description: The reported new offering would come at an opportune time for the kingdom, which is spending heavily on megaprojects while seeing lower oil revenue.

item.title: Hedge funds have sold out of cyclical stocks at fastest rate in a year
Uber gears up for Paris Olympics by offering free cruises across the Seine and discounts to ease the load on public transport networks
item.description: Paris is expecting 30% more visitors this summer than usual—and Uber's support may help the city's public transport systems cope with the strain.

item.title: Dick's Sporting Goods raises guidance, says shoppers are spending more on sneakers and athletic gear
item.description: Dick's Sporting Goods saw sales grow well ahead of estimates, following behind other retailers that said consumers are spending on new clothes and shoes.

item.title: Merck to buy EyeBio for up to $3 billion
ONS dealing with 20% staf exodus weeks after facing strikes over return to office orders
item.description: Headcount has dipped at the ONS at the same time as the stats body fights with staff over office attendance.

item.title: Clean Energy Ventures raises $305 million to back early-stage climate startups
item.description: Clean energy stocks may be underperforming in the public market, but in private markets there is still appetite for companies focused on decarbonization.

item.title: Anglo American rejects BHP request to have more time for deal talks
The future is a state of mind: What it takes to build a future-ready company
item.description: The best and most future-ready CEOs and leaders know how to balance prudence and patience with ambition and experimentation.

item.title: Weekly mortgage demand drops to three-month low, as rates begin climbing again
item.description: After a brief pullback during much of May, mortgage rates began rising again last week.

item.title: Cathie Wood met Nayib Bukele. Here's what she is saying about El Salvador.
